tool_description: API empowers you to take control of your product information, streamline operations, and stay ahead of the competition.
name: Product Inventory API
title: Product Inventory API

api_list.name: Create New Product
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://product-inventory-api.p.rapidapi.com/products"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "product-inventory-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://product-inventory-api.p.rapidapi.com/products"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "product-inventory-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
